infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Next Conan's Hint  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri, Next Conan's Hint  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Akio Otsuka as Sango Yokomizo  Yuko Sasaki as Noe Tanigawa  Koji Tsujitani as Kazuyoshi Sunaoka  Yuji Fujishiro as Yusaku Akashi  Nobuo Shimazaki as Katsuaki Nagatsuka  Katsuyuki Konishi as Doctor  Nao Takamori as Beautiful girl (Episode 185)  Takashi Nagasako as Detective A  Isshin Chiba as Detective B  Takashi Taniguchi as Toshiaki Tahara

sections.Characters introduced:
- Shizuoka Police detective
- Shizuoka Police detective
sections.Situation: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are driving through the forest when an arrow almost hits Kogoro. Afterwards, they stay at a hotel where an actor is found dead with a bullet in his head. All of the evidence suggests that it is the work of an outsider.
sections.People:
- 60 years old
- Lodge owner
- Victim (gunshot)
- 30 years old
- Actor • Urban Hunter role
- 40 years old
- Producer
- 27 years old
- Kazuyoshi's manager
- Owner/CEO
- 35 years old
- Scriptwriter
sections.Resolution: The culprit is Toshiaki Tahara. Tahara is arrested and he reveals he wanted to write a perfect crime script that no one could solve, but Sunaoka laughed at him and showed ingratitude.
sections.Trivia:
- Urban Hunter is a reference to the series City Hunter, in which Kogoro's first voice actor Akira Kamiya played the main character, Ryo Saeba.
- Katsuaki Nagatsuka speaks Osaka-ben.
sections.Quotes:
- Conan Edogawa:
There's an exit to every maze.  (どんな迷路にも必ず出口はある。)
